build.buildCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix frontend && npm run type-check --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

deploy.startCommand: bash -c 'for dir in /app/backend /app ./backend backend; do if [ -d "$dir" ] && [ -f "$dir/app/main.py" ]; then cd "$dir" && exec uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT; fi; done; echo "Error: backend directory not found" && exit 1'
